name: Resmulz (Isekai)
description: Resmulz, called the 'Dragon King' by everyone who fears him, is the leader of the Codomo race.  His sword Amalgam allows him to rip a hole in time and space to travel to other BONDLYVERSE worlds and locations.

name: BomSmap (ULTRA)
description: Entitiles owner to 1 BondSwap (Gold) PolkaPet Card

name: Farzin (Isekai)
description: On Darsia, Farzin is the strongest, bravest, and most well-known guild master. His phenomenal combat skills earned him the title of "The Hero of All Time". Farzin continues to seek power to become the most mighty warrior and save the world. Legends say that he has the might of an entire army, a living fear of all villians. In addition to his combative abilities, Farzin has proven himself to be a master of battlefield strategy. (在Darsia上，法神(Farzin)是最強大，最勇敢和最著名的行會大師。 他非凡的戰鬥技巧為他贏得了“有史以來的最强英雄”的頭銜。 Farzin繼續尋求權力，成為最強大的戰士並拯救世界。 傳說他擁有一支全副武装的军队，让Bondly宇宙中的恶魔充滿了恐惧。 除了出色的戰鬥能力，除了出色的戰鬥能力，法神還證明自己是戰場上的戰略大師。 他是所有英雄追隨的希望和正義的支柱。 頑強，聰明且廣受尊重，法神是迄今為止最好的公會大師。)

name: Uth (Gothic Horror)
description: Uth gave up his humanity and used dark energy to enhance his strength and power which has fused him physically with a mantis demon.  He's smart and calculating as much as he is deadly with just his fist or tonfa, but is forced to battle with two minds in every decision.

name: Darken the Shadow OST (Gothic Horror)
description: Digital pass for the Darken the Shadow OST featuring lead artist and composer PelleK.  The owner of this NFT will get airdropped all of the tracks, album art, behind-the-scenes footage and additional content relating to the album release including a special NFT release for the PolkaPets community.

name: Darken the Shadow OST - 1 - Introduction Track (Gothic Horror)
description: Darken the Shadow - Track 1 of 8 , NFT VERSION EXCLUSIVE

name: Denthe (Thriller)
description: Denthe runs the 'Erebus' crime syndicate and is as calculating as he is aggressive.  He uses offensive energy weapons for short and long range combat and is a master at close range fighting.

name: Bianca - Madness by Midnight
description: Art by IG : ninjaart4

name: River (Thriller)
description: Semi-automatic special forces weapon, codenamed RIVER, is designed for infiltration. The standard issue magazine is a rotary which carries 30 rounds for both traditional and IDK loadouts.  The selective fire modes are safe mode, semi-auto and 2-round burst.

name: Cassius (Thriller)
description: Son of a famous politician, Cassius enjoys the luxuries of the Joluien upper class, but finds himself more comfortable working with Erebus as Denthe's Lieutenant.  When hes not running logistics for illegal implants and IKD crystals hes at the casino running tables.

name: Bianca (Gothic Horror)
description: Bianca is a demon succubus and leader of the Dark Wizard coven.  She commands mind controlled wizards from both sides.  Her powers of suggestion are considered the strongest in the world and can only be countered by special magical seals.

name: Bianca - Purple Power
description: Thanks to everyone who participated in our Merch store launch!  Art by IG : ninjaart4

name: Alt Seasons Greetings!
description: Sisters Bianca and Adelaide (and her cat Nefarious) spend the day doing their favorite holiday tradition: making a Snow-Demon.

name: Arca (Thriller)
description: Arca is an ex-spy.  She's part cybernetic and has incredible strength and agility. Prefers bladed weapons for stealthy quick kills.

name: BomSmap (Malli Smap)
description: Entitiles owner to 1 BondSwap (Ally Swap) PolkaPet Card

name: Darken the Shadow OST - 2 - PelleK ft. Quadeca - Darken the Shadow
description:
Darken the Shadow - Track 2 of 8. (Darken the Shadow ft. Quadeca)



Music written by William Graney and PelleK

Lyrics written by Jonathan Young

Rap lyrics written by Quadeca

Vocals by PelleK. Rap by Quadeca

Backing vocals by Jonathan Young

Solo violin by Rob Landes

Orchestration by William Graney

Intro violin melody from "Solveig's Song" (public domain)

Produced by Arsafes Productions and William Graney

Darken the Shadow characters by Hikaru

Animated by Animind Studio

Mixed and mastered by Arsafes Productions



Special thanks to PelleK NFT Holders and the Bondly boys for the massive support with my first NFT's,  and to Brandon Smith, for letting me make this album with u for DtS.

name: BlandDox (Aflampt)
description: Entitiles owner to 1 BondDex (Adapt) PolkaPet Card

name: Requiem (Thriller)
description: Requiem is unique, but desired across the globe and praised for its stability, reliability and versatility.  Accepts multiple ammo types but carries 2 Purple IKD grenades  sThe selective fire modes are safe mode, semi-auto and 3-round burst.

name: Bridge over Troubled Water
description: Bridge Mutual x Bondly

name: Aria (Thriller)
description: Aria is considered the most famous pop star in Polis, but by night, she runs 'BlackNeon', rival syndicate focused on providing illegal IKD enhanced technology to the elite.

name: Bianca - Alt Season
description: Timelapse video of Bianca from our Executive Producer Asula.   Art by IG : Asula_Art

name: Adelaide (Gothic Horror)
description: Adelaide considers herself the last true High Demon scholar of Serovolah.   Unlike her other family members, she solves problems with intellect rather than violence and manipulation, but isn't afraid to use her exceptional Shadow Magic when needed.  Her lifes work is to understand what caused 'The Event' millennia ago.

name: Bianca - Arc of Mayhem
description: Arc of Mayhem-min
